description: This hardshell jacket delivers everything you need and nothing you don’t. Ideal for freeriding and ski touring, the Eiger Free Advanced breaks all the rules for feather-light, hard-wearing, and super packable hardshells. Boasting supple fabric with a GORE-TEX ePE membrane that’s waterproof, breathable, PFC-free, and sustainable - this jacket ticks all the boxes. Developed alongside their pro athletes Jeremie Heitz and Nadine Wallner, this Eiger Collection powerhouse offers full freedom of movement, and all the protection you need for challenging ascents and big powder descents. Fully focused on performance, the Eiger Free Advanced is ready to tackle anything you throw at it.
name: Mammut Eiger Free Advanced HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
